topics.body:
*randomly clicking pages on information*
Well I found something interesting.  Apparently satanism isn't actually the worship of Lucifer, but more of pagan ideology with a lot of their religious ideology coming from ancient egypt and ancient rome and greek beliefs and they just called themselves satanism to piss off christians.

You learn something every day.
